SEARCH
Package main.java.daos

Class PaymentDAO

java.lang.Object
main.java.daos.PaymentDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAOInterface<PaymentMethod>
public class PaymentDAO extends Object implements DAOInterface<PaymentMethod>
PaymentDAO is implemented from DAOInterface. PaymentDAO is a Data Access Object (DAO) for managing PaymentMethod objects with CRUD Operations. It provides methods to interact with PaymentMethod data stored in Excel files.
Since:
23-Apr-2024
Version:
1.2
Author:
SDDA Team 1

  • Constructor Details

    • PaymentDAO

      public PaymentDAO()
      Constructor for PaymentDAO. Initializes paymentMethodList and reads data from Excel files.

  • Method Details

    • readData

      public void readData()
      Reads data from Excel files and populates the paymentMethodList. If the files do not exist, it creates new Excel files. Handles IOException if encountered while reading or creating the files.
      Specified by:
      readData in interface DAOInterface<PaymentMethod>

    • saveData

      public void saveData()
      Saves the data from paymentMethodList to Excel files. If the files do not exist, it creates new ones. Handles IOException if encountered while writing the files.
      Specified by:
      saveData in interface DAOInterface<PaymentMethod>

    • getElements

      public List<PaymentMethod> getElements()
      Returns the list of PaymentMethods stored in paymentMethodList.
      Specified by:
      getElements in interface DAOInterface<PaymentMethod>
      Returns:
      List of PaymentMethods

    • addElement

      public void addElement(PaymentMethod item)
      Adds a new PaymentMethod to the list.
      Specified by:
      addElement in interface DAOInterface<PaymentMethod>
      Parameters:
      item - The PaymentMethod object to add

    • removeElement

      public void removeElement(String methodName)
      Removes a PaymentMethod from the list by its name.
      Specified by:
      removeElement in interface DAOInterface<PaymentMethod>
      Parameters:
      methodName - The Name of the PaymentMethod to remove

    • findElement

      public PaymentMethod findElement(String itemName)
      Finds and returns a PaymentMethod by its name.
      Specified by:
      findElement in interface DAOInterface<PaymentMethod>
      Parameters:
      itemName - The Name of the PaymentMethod to find
      Returns:
      The found PaymentMethod, or null if not found

    • updateElement

      public void updateElement(PaymentMethod oldElement, PaymentMethod newElement)
      Updates an existing PaymentMethod with new data.
      Specified by:
      updateElement in interface DAOInterface<PaymentMethod>
      Parameters:
      oldElement - The old PaymentMethod object to update
      newElement - The new PaymentMethod object containing updated data
